import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import * as moment from 'moment'; import { classRoom, student } from '../_models/entityModels'; @Component({ selector: 'app-reg-student', templateUrl: './reg-student.component.html', styleUrls: ['./reg-student.component.css'] }) export class RegStudentComponent implements OnInit{ baseurl = "https://localhost:7217/api/" student : student | any = {} classRoom : classRoom[] | any selectedClassRoom : classRoom | any bsValue = new Date(); maxDate = new Date(); constructor(private http: HttpClient) { this.maxDate.setDate(this.maxDate.getDate() + 7); } ngOnInit(): void { this.getClassroom() } getClassroom(){ this.http.get(this.baseurl + 'classRoom/').subscribe({ next : response => { this.classRoom = response; }, error: () => console.log(console.error()), complete: () => console.log('Requse has Been Completed') }) } register(){ this.student.dateOfBirth=moment(this.bsValue).format("YYYY/MM/DD"); console.log(this.student); } }
